Movie Data.Plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
Movie Data.Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
Movie Data.Actors: Eli Wallach, Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Aldo Giuffrè
Movie Data.Writer: Luciano Vincenzoni (story), Sergio Leone (story), Agenore Incrocci (screenplay), Furio Scarpelli (screenplay), Luciano Vincenzoni (screenplay), Sergio Leone (screenplay), Mickey Knox (English version by)

Movie Data.Plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
Movie Data.Title: The Godfather
Movie Data.Actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Richard S. Castellano
Movie Data.Writer: Mario Puzo (screenplay), Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay), Mario Puzo (novel)

Movie Data.Plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.
Movie Data.Title: The Godfather: Part II
Movie Data.Actors: Al Pacino, Robert Duvall, Diane Keaton, Robert De Niro
Movie Data.Writer: Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay), Mario Puzo (screenplay), Mario Puzo (based on the novel "The Godfather" by)

Movie Data.Plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Movie Data.Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Movie Data.Actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
Movie Data.Awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 16 nominations.
Movie Data.Writer: Stephen King (short story "Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption"), Frank Darabont (screenplay)

Movie Data.Plot: When Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent launch an assault on the mob, they let the clown out of the box, the Joker, bent on turning Gotham on itself and bringing any heroes down to his level.
Movie Data.Title: The Dark Knight
Movie Data.Actors: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
Movie Data.Writer: Jonathan Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (screenplay), Christopher Nolan (story), David S. Goyer (story), Bob Kane (characters)
